text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/04357fbb87e65e50cc76295aec50114adb5cbd68|patch 8.1.2415: popup menu flickers if an info popup is used>
patch 8.1.2415: popup menu flickers if an info popup is used

Problem:    Popup menu flickers if an info popup is used. (Nick Spoons)
Solution:   Set the pum_skip_redraw flag.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2415: popup menu flickers if an info popup is used · vim/vim@04357fb
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2415: popup menu flickers if an info popup is used · vim/vim@04357fb
attachments.text: Problem: Popup menu flickers if an info popup is used. (Nick Spoons) Solution: Set the pum_skip_redraw flag.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/e24c5b3332b453175e5f73423884087a4aef1247|patch 8.1.2416: loading menus sets v:errmsg>
patch 8.1.2416: loading menus sets v:errmsg

Problem:    Loading menus sets v:errmsg.
Solution:   Avoid setting v:errmsg and add a test for that. (Jason Franklin)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2416: loading menus sets v:errmsg · vim/vim@e24c5b3
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2416: loading menus sets v:errmsg · vim/vim@e24c5b3
attachments.text: Problem: Loading menus sets v:errmsg. Solution: Avoid setting v:errmsg and add a test for that. (Jason Franklin)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/1e46705a83ef2bbabd4a53ec40108558b73ed54f|patch 8.1.2417: MinGW/Cygwin build does not clean up all files>
patch 8.1.2417: MinGW/Cygwin build does not clean up all files

Problem:    MinGW/Cygwin build does not clean up all files.
Solution:   Delete *.map files. (Michael Soyka)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2417: MinGW/Cygwin build does not clean up all files · vim/vim@1e46705
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2417: MinGW/Cygwin build does not clean up all files · vim/vim@1e46705
attachments.text: Problem: MinGW/Cygwin build does not clean up all files. Solution: Delete *.map files. (Michael Soyka)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/99ebf22c523e3fdb491b2c92b6f3a7d42721361d|patch 8.1.2418: bufnr('$') is wrong after recycling popup buffer>
patch 8.1.2418: bufnr('$') is wrong after recycling popup buffer

Problem:    bufnr('$') is wrong after recycling popup buffer.
Solution:   Sort the buffer list by buffer number. (closes #5335)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2418: bufnr('$') is wrong after recycling popup buffer · vim/vim@99ebf22
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2418: bufnr('$') is wrong after recycling popup buffer · vim/vim@99ebf22
attachments.text: Problem: bufnr('$') is wrong after recycling popup buffer. Solution: Sort the buffer list by buffer number. (closes #5335)
